questions.question: What is the primary function of the depicted product, as visually evident?
Considering the image, what material appears to constitute the primary component?
Based solely on the visual depiction, what is the overall shape of the product?
Judging from the image, what is the dominant color of the product itself?
From what can be visually ascertained, what level of transparency does the product exhibit?
Does the image reveal any visible text or markings on the product itself?
Based on visual inspection, is the surface of the product visibly textured or smooth?
Considering the image, what appears to be the approximate thickness of the product?
Based on the visual depiction, is the product flexible or rigid in appearance?
Does the image show any evidence of the product's adherence to a surface?
Judging from the image, what is the apparent level of reflectivity of the product's surface?
From what is visually shown, what is the apparent edge profile of the product?
What is the visual relationship between the screen protector and the phone in the image?
Based on the visual presentation, what is the apparent size relationship between the product and a smartphone?
Judging from the illustration, does the product cover the entire screen of the device?
